summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BLOCK 75 Memory & Self-Validation Layer implementation. All 11 backend API endpoints are functioning correctly, and both frontend pages (/fractal and /admin/fractal) are working properly.
passed_tests: POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/memory/write-snapshots?symbol=BTC - Successfully writes 36 snapshots (6 horizons × 3 presets × 2 roles)
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/memory/write-snapshots idempotency - Second call correctly skips all existing snapshots
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/memory/snapshots/latest?symbol=BTC&focus=30d - Returns valid snapshot with kernelDigest and tierWeights
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/memory/snapshots/count - Returns accurate total count and role breakdown
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/memory/forward-stats?symbol=BTC - Returns forward truth stats (no resolved outcomes yet, which is expected)
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/memory/attribution/summary?symbol=BTC - Returns attribution analysis (no outcomes available yet, which is expected)
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/governance/policy/current?symbol=BTC - Returns current config with proper tierWeights structure
Frontend /fractal page loads correctly with all components (chart modes, horizon selector, forecast summary, distribution stats, matches list)
Frontend /admin/fractal page loads correctly with institutional panel and admin layout
